value.BodyPreview:
Hi Tony,

I have created the Forest View <TEST> company.  There is only one item and one customer for now because they haven’t finished cleansing their master data.  However, for the purpose of us configuring their SO, we should be able to start in the

Body.Content:
Hi Tony,

 

I have created the Forest View <TEST> company.  There is only one item and one customer for now because they haven’t finished cleansing their master data.  However, for the purpose of us configuring their SO, we should be able to start in the test company.  For terms and conditions, it is in their sample attached.  The HST number is stored in the “Company Information” window (see below).

 

 

Thanks

Katrina

 

From: Katrina She
Sent: June 29, 2018 10:48 AM
To: Tony Qian <tony.qian@websan.com>
Cc: 'support@websan.com' <support@websan.com>
Subject: RE: Issue #79363: Configure the Sales Order template (Forest View)

 

Sample sales order below

 

 

______________________

Katrina She

  

Project Manager | WebSan Solutions Inc. | www.websan.com

Office (416) 499-1235 x 211 | DID: (647) 776-9961|Fax (416) 499-6889

value.Subject: RE: Issue #78969: Route Sequence Project (7seas)
value.BodyPreview:
Thanks Justin. Yes the DDR walk-through was very helpful.

Also, can you help guide me in managing the roles and users for DDR access as well – how to control which users to have access or not.
Thanks!


From: Justin Plaizier [mailto:Justin.Plaizier

Body.Content:
Thanks Justin. Yes the DDR walk-through was very helpful.

 

Also, can you help guide me in managing the roles and users for DDR access as well – how to control which users to have access or not.

Thanks!

 

 

From: Justin Plaizier [mailto:Justin.Plaizier@websan.com]
Sent: July-09-18 8:45 AM
To: Tony Chow
Cc: WebSan Support; Anshul Dewan
Subject: RE: Issue #78969: Route Sequence Project (7seas)

 

Hey All,

 

I hope you found our DDR walk-through helpful.

 

Here’s a link to our recording – unfortunately it seems the audio didn’t come through properly.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ebRFPkEcUk8&feature=youtu.be

 

We’ve also created an additional ticket for your request to clean up the additional ‘structures’ within the DDR.

 

Tony, here’s a query to get you started with your “Route Sequence Report Data”

 

SELECT [11Route] AS 'Route'

       ,[11Customer Number] AS 'Customer Number'

       ,[11Sequence] AS 'Sequence'

       ,[11Packing] AS 'Packing'

       ,UploadDateTime

       ,UploadUser

FROM WebsanTimePortal.dbo.dynamicStructures

WHERE schemaID = 11

 

Let us know if you have any further questions!

 

Kind regards,

______________________

Justin Plaizier

  

Technical Application Specialist | WebSan Solutions Inc. | www.websan.com

Office (416) 499-1235 x 215 | DID: (647) 776-9965|Fax (416) 499-6889

justin.plaizier@websan.com

 

SILVER Certified Microsoft Enterprise Resource Planning Partner

2015 Microsoft Dynamics President’s Club

2016 Profit 500 Member

WINNER - 2017 Canada’s 50 Best Managed IT Companies

WINNER - 2017 Microsoft Modern Marketing Innovation Award Winner

Subject: FW: Assigning WebSan as your partner

From: Wingrove Carmichael <Wingrove.Carmichael@websan.com>
Sent: Monday, July 9, 2018 11:04 AM

value.Subject: RE: Issue #79566: Not able to connect to smart connect (Sunwing Airlines)
value.BodyPreview:
Hi Prashant,

I hope your day is going well.
At the bottom of your screenshot, there’s a bar asking you to open the RDP file. Please select open and your computer should then open up a connection to SmartConnect.
Please note: You may be prompted to en

Body.Content:
Hi Prashant,

 

I hope your day is going well.

At the bottom of your screenshot, there’s a bar asking you to open the RDP file. Please select open and your computer should then open up a connection to SmartConnect.

Please note: You may be prompted to enter your credentials again, this is normal.

 

If you encounter any additional issues, please let me know. I will be happy to assist.

 

Regards,

______________________

Devon Shuttleworth-Smalley

  

Technical Application Specialist | WebSan Solutions Inc. | www.websan.com

Office (416) 499-1235 x 221 | DID: (647) 776-7954 | Fax (416) 499-6889
